sentences.sCn: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.sContent: I have some news for you.
sentences.sCn: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.sContent: The letter is addressed to both of you.
Did Robin give you the money?
Only you can make this decision.
sentences.sCn: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.sContent: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.sCn: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.sContent: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!

phrases.pCn: ◎【军事】[用作操练口令]原地不动，还原，复原(指恢复原来的姿势)

trans.tranOther: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

trans.tranCn: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷
